description: Try this zingy green smoothie recipe for the perfect morning kick-starter. With the addition of spinach and ginger, it's a twist on a classic mango smoothie.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Jan Feb 2021,Mango,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spinach, Mango & Ginger Smoothies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place mango, ginger, spinach, coconut water and hemp seeds in a blender with 4 ice cubes and blitz until smooth. Serve topped with extra hemp seeds.
